leve.name: Permit for Destruction of Religious Property
leve.description: There have been disturbing reports that vandals have carved insults of the Fury into the ruins in the Chocobo Forest. The lords will not stand for it, and demand that the offending sections of these ruins are destroyed completely. Bring me evidence of the deed, and you will be handsomely rewarded.
leve.client: Temple Knights Minister of Coin, Amianne Tristelle
